```{r setup, include=FALSE}

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE,warning=F)
options(scipen=999)
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
library(devtools)
library(ggplot2)
library(maps)
library(tigris)
library(ggmap)
library(kableExtra)

```


```{r}
arrests = read.csv('Police_Arrests_Clean2.csv') 

arrests %>%
  mutate(latitude = round(latitude,2), longitude=round(longitude,2))%>%
  select(Arrest_Date, Street, Arrest_Type, Drugs_Alcohol, Age, Gender, Race, Disposition) %>%
  arrange(Arrest_Date) %>%
  sample_n(5) %>%
  kbl(align='l',vline='|') %>%
  kable_styling()
```
